root.name: Wakfu
root.description: Features14 unique classes25,000 active players per serverNot a single npc in the entire worldGoverning system that allows you to vote elect players to govern each islandRealistic eco-system that allows you to shape the world of forests or barrensAdvanced A.I. for mobs in a sense that they will migrate if there isn't enough vegetation around, level up if they manage to kill a player etcCharactersEnutrofSadidaSramXelor: time based mage.Cra: rangerSram: thief / assasinSadida: druidIop: warriorEniripsa: healerSacrier: bezerkerOsamodas: summonerEcaflip: gamblerFeca: tank casterPandawa: brawlerEnutrof: treasure hunter
